type.name: org.gradle.api.logging.Logging
type.description:
*

The main entry point for Gradle's logging system. Gradle routes all logging via SLF4J. You can use either an SLF4J * {@link org.slf4j.Logger} or a Gradle {@link Logger} to perform logging.

method.name: getLogger
method.description: * Returns the logger for the given class. * * @param c the class. * @return the logger. Never returns null.

method.name: getLogger
method.description: * Returns the logger with the given name. * * @param name the logger name. * @return the logger. Never returns null.

property.name: logger
property.description: * Returns the logger with the given name. * * @param name the logger name. * @return the logger. Never returns null.
